welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shinjuku, Japan! Get ready to experience the vibrant energy of this bustling city known for its iconic skyline, bustling streets, and lively nightlife. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that Shinjuku has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: どん亭
restaurants.description: どん亭 is a shabu-shabu restaurant located in 中野区.
restaurants.address: 江原町3-18-1 (花ビルII), 中野区, 東京都, 165-0023

restaurants.name: Menya Kintoki (麺や金時)
restaurants.description: Menya Kintoki (麺や金時) is a ramen restaurant located in 練馬区.

restaurants.name: Syabu-Yo (しゃぶ葉 豊玉北店)
restaurants.description: Syabu-Yo (しゃぶ葉 豊玉北店) is a shabu-shabu restaurant located in 練馬区.

restaurants.name: 猫居酒屋 赤茄子
restaurants.description: 猫居酒屋 赤茄子 is a pet café located in 練馬区.

restaurants.name: Parlour Ekoda (パーラー江古田)
restaurants.description: Parlour Ekoda (パーラー江古田) is a bakery located in 練馬区.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Haneda Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 3 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both military and civilian flights.

terminals.name: Passenger Terminal
terminals.description: The passenger terminal at Yokota AFB Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
